titles: Lorde omnipotent and moste mercyfull father gyue us remissyon of our synne, and graunt us delyueraunce from all oure iniquitie.
publisher: By [N. Hill? for] Rycharde Jugge, dwellynge in Paules church yarde at the sygne of the Bible,
notes: Possible printer's name and publication date from STC.
New Year's prayer for Edward VI and sisters.--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
